info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 31 at 3:07PM EDT until August 01 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Fairfield County. * WHEN...From this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional statements and/or advisories may be needed for Tuesday and Wednesday nights high tide.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
